bug.author: dzung-hoang
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
opencv_extra => master Operating System / Platform => All Compiler => All
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
In the file opencv_extra/testdata/dnn/download_models.py, the URL for the file tiny-yolo-voc.weights is stale. The correct URL is <denchmark-link:https://pjreddie.com/media/files/yolov2-tiny-voc.weights>https://pjreddie.com/media/files/yolov2-tiny-voc.weights</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>$ cd opencv_extra/testdata/dnn $ python download_models.py </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dzung-hoang>@dzung-hoang</denchmark-link> , Thank you! Feel free to open a pull request at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv_extra>https://github.com/opencv/opencv_extra</denchmark-link> .
